mapper.sql: u.unit_id, u.building_id,u.child_id,u.community_id, u.unit_name, u.unit_no, u.unit_covered_area, u.unit_relative_proportion, u.unit_child_relative_proportion, u.unit_purpose, u.unit_position, u.unit_type, u.unit_full_address, u.unit_status,u.unit_title, u.create_time, u.update_time,uu2.owner,uu2.user_id as ownerId, c.community_id,c.community_no,c.community_name, b.building_id, b.building_name, b.building_no
mapper.select:
select
from unit u inner join building b on b.building_id=u.building_id inner join community c on c.community_id=b.community_id left join user_unit uu2 on u.unit_id=uu2.unit_id and uu2.owner=1 and uu2.convincing=1 where u.unit_id = #{unitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from unit u inner join building b on b.building_id=u.building_id inner join community c on c.community_id=b.community_id left join user_unit uu2 on u.unit_id=uu2.unit_id and uu2.owner=1 and uu2.convincing=1 where u.unit_no = #{unitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and u.community_id = #{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select u.unit_id, u.building_id,u.child_id,u.community_id, u.unit_name, u.unit_no, u.unit_covered_area, u.unit_relative_proportion, u.unit_child_relative_proportion, u.unit_purpose, u.unit_position, u.unit_type, u.unit_full_address, u.unit_status,u.unit_title, u.create_time, u.update_time from unit u inner join user_unit uu on u.unit_id = uu.unit_id where uu.user_id=#{userId} order by `owner` desc,convincing desc;
mapper.insert: insert into unit (unit_id, building_id,child_id,community_id, unit_name, unit_no, unit_covered_area, unit_relative_proportion, unit_child_relative_proportion, unit_purpose, unit_position, unit_type, unit_full_address, unit_status,unit_title, create_time, update_time ) values (#{unitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{childId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitCoveredArea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unitRelativeProportion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unitChildRelativeProportion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unitPurpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitFullAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{unitTitle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

update_time,

mapper.update:
update unit
building_id = #{buildingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
child_id = #{childId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
community_id = #{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_no = #{unitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_covered_area = #{unitCoveredArea,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
unit_relative_proportion = #{unitRelativeProportion,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
unit_child_relative_proportion = #{unitChildRelativeProportion,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
unit_purpose = #{unitPurpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_position = #{unitPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_type = #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
unit_full_address = #{unitFullAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_status = #{unitStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
unit_title = #{unitTitle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where unit_id = #{unitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update unit set building_id = #{buildingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, child_id = #{childId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, community_id = #{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_no = #{unitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_covered_area = #{unitCoveredArea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unit_relative_proportion = #{unitRelativeProportion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unit_child_relative_proportion = #{unitChildRelativeProportion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unit_purpose = #{unitPurpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_position = #{unitPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_type = #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit_full_address = #{unitFullAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_status = #{unitStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit_title = #{unitTitle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where unit_id = #{unitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
